# addMotionEffect(_:)

**Instance Method**

Begins applying a motion effect to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addMotionEffect(_ effect: UIMotionEffect)
```

## Parameters

- **effect**: The motion effect.

## Discussion

The system animates the transition to the motion effect’s values using the present [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView] animation context. The motion effect’s keyPath/value pairs are applied to the view’s presentation layer.

## Using motion effects

- **motionEffects**: The array of motion effects for the view.
- **removeMotionEffect(_:)**: Stops applying a motion effect to the view.
